Your Team

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Rosen Group Private Wealth Management Advisory Team

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lewis Rosen founded Rosen Group Private Wealth Management to provide Wealth Management solutions for Doctors, Dentists and Successful Individuals.

This concentrated focus, coupled with a very unique perspective, gives the team an unparalleled understanding of the sophisticated investment, tax and risk management strategies needed to create a successful wealth plan that enhances and preserves clients’ individual needs.

The Rosen Group Private Wealth Management advisory team specializes in active, pension style investment management as they construct custom portfolios with a focus on handpicked individual securities. They hold the belief that active management along with customized portfolios is a more efficient way of managing risk and reducing costs for their clients.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”850px” custom_margin=”60px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||20px||false|false” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMwNCJ9fQ==@” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/lewis-rosen_new.png” title_text=”lewis-rosen_new” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”170px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”11bdff53-0f60-41da-9bfc-0062fc547638″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Remembering Jim Uniacke

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” module_alignment=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”400px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We were deeply saddened to lose a good friend and valued team member when Jim passed away on Wednesday, June 4, 2014.

He remains in our thoughts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/remembering-jim.jpg” title_text=”remembering-jim” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”36px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Your TeamThe Rosen Group Private Wealth Management Advisory TeamLewis Rosen founded Rosen Group Private Wealth Management to provide Wealth Management solutions for Doctors, Dentists and Successful Individuals. This concentrated focus, coupled with a very unique perspective, gives the team an unparalleled understanding of the sophisticated investment, tax and risk management strategies needed to create a successful wealth plan that enhances and preserves clients’ individual needs. The Rosen Group Private Wealth Management advisory team specializes in active, pension style investment management as they construct custom portfolios with a focus on handpicked individual securities. They hold the belief that active management along with customized portfolios is a more efficient way of managing risk and reducing costs for their clients.Lewis Rosen CEO & FOUNDERChristine Cao, MSc. CFA CIO & Portfolio ManagerAndrew Stulberg, CFP, RRC SENIOR FINANCIAL PLANNER, PRIVATE CLIENT GROUPPhilippe Capelle, CPA, CFA Portfolio ManagerTrevor Parry, M.A., LL.B, LL.M (Tax). TEP Senior Estate Planning AdvisorRosie LeBlanc Executive Assistant to the CEO & Office ManagerThanh Truong, CIM® Branch AdministratorDeborah Tone Executive ReceptionistFrank Rosen Administrative AssistantSarah Rosenberg Human Resources AssistantRemembering Jim UniackeWe were deeply saddened to lose a good friend and valued team member when Jim passed away on Wednesday, June 4, 2014. He remains […]
